Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Relaxed and super nice staff. Great beers and the food is delicious. Finally a restaurant that you leave full and content for just 20euros per person! (1 beer + diner)

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: What a great little find, just slightly off the beaten track. Didn't try any food, but visited just for some drinks - great, varied beer menu . Friendly and helpful service also great.

Name: brouw bar
Review Text:
Awesome food and decor.
Having moved here from New Orleans, I'm really excited to have found a restaurant with awesome southern style bbq (and a great sauce) as well as a bunch of American beers!

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Had lunch - limited food menu, but good beer menu (for Amsterdam). Service was friendly and helpful. Went out of their way to give tourists ideas for things to see.

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Best burger ever! Always great and always takes a while to come out - so maybe get a dip platter to start. Their wings have been hit and miss - so keep that in mind.

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Awesome beer selection. Decent snacks. Cozy vibe inside. Great street seating too.

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Got take away sandwiches and a beer while waiting on a Sunday afternoon. Very nice, and the sandwiches were good, but also insanely expensive!

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Excellent beer, great decor, but a little tight on busy evenings

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: First time at I went there the Pulled Pork was awesome. The second time, it was not really good. Hope at my next visit it will be like the first time.

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Good beer, good food and a lot of it. Service is friendly but a little leisurely.

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Great selection of unusual beer, friendly staff and cosy atmosphere

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Great choice of beers, good atmosphere.

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Good beer selection, service ok

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Great pulled pork. Good American beer selection.

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: I really realy like the Meat Lover Plate，sooooo coooool，LoL.

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Drinks are way overpriced. Would never go back.

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Looks great, but this is shut until November 2016!

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Delicious meat dishes for a reasonable price.

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Great food, great beers!

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Cozy with an excellent selection of beer

Name: brouw bar
Review Text: Their brisket is delicious.

Name: brouw bar

Review Text: (Translated by Google) The simple atmosphere and the delicious food for a good price. I would like to come back more often for that. Top people. Keep it up ! …
